src_original: “ado jagdhiḥ“iti sūtre ti kitītyeva siddhe lyabgrahaṇamasyā jñapakamiti“ado jagdhiḥ“ityatra bhāṣye spaṣṭam//  nanvevamapi“iyāya“ityādau dvitve kṛte 'ntaraṅgatvāt savarṇadīrghatve tadasiddhirata āha :-  vārṇādāṅgaṃ balīyo bhavati // Paribh_55 //  tenāntaraṅgamapi savatṇadīrghaṃ bādhitvā vṛddhiriti tatsiddhiḥ/
tgt_original: yadāha cyavante plavante ityatra vārṇādāṅgaṁ balīya ityekādeśāt prāgguṇa iti |  tatrāsyāḥ kva cidvyāśraye'pi pravṛttirityatrārthe yajayācayatavicchapraccharakṣo naṅ ityatra naṅo ṅitkaraṇaṁ guṇapratiṣedhārthaṁ kriyamāṇaṁ jñāpakam |  anyathā hi vicchestuki sati guṇaprasaṅga eva nāstīti naṅo ṅitkaraṇamanarthakaṁsyāt ||

src_original: taddhi 'īṣatuḥ' ityādāviyaṅādivyāvṛtyartham/  etatparibhāṣābhāve tu 'īṣatuḥ' ityādāvantaraṅgeṇa savarṇadīrgheṇa bādhāttadvyartham/  iyaṅuvaṅau hyabhyāsasambandhanimittakatvād bahiraṅgau/
tgt_original: taddhyevamarthaṁ kriyate,  īṣaturīṣurūṣaturūṣurityatra savarṇe'cīyaṅuvaṅau mābhūtāmiti |  yadi ca vārṇādāṅgasya balīyastvaṁ na syāt |

src_original: na ceyaṅādirapavādaḥ,  'yenanāprāpti' nyāyena 'iyati' ityādisakalalakṣya prāpta yaṇapavādatvasyaiva nirṇayāditi prāñcaḥ/
tgt_original: tadā'ntaraṅgatvātkṛte savarṇadīrghatve iyaṅuvaṅoḥ prāptireva nāstīti kimasavarṇeneti tatkṛtaṁ jñāpayatyastīyaṁ paribhāṣeti |
yadi savarṇe'cīyaṅuvaṅau na bhavatastadeyeṣovoṣetyatrāpīyaṅuvaṅau na prāpnutaḥ,

src_original: na ; anayā paribhāṣayā strīpratyaya samabhivyāhāre tadrahite dṛṣṭānāṃ prātipadikatva tadvyāpya dharmāṇāṃ viśiṣṭe 'pi paryāptatvamatidiśyata  nanvevam 'yūnaḥ paśya' ityatreva 'yuvatiḥ paśya' ityatrāpi“śvayuvonām“iti samprasāraṇaṃ syāt,
tgt_original: vibhaktyāśrayeṣu kāryeṣu liṅgaviśiṣṭaparibhāṣā na pravarttate |  tena gomatītyatrogidacām iti numna bhavati |  tathā supuṁsītyatra puṁso'suṅ neti |  yuvatīḥ paśyetyatra śvayuvamaghonāmataddhhita iti saṁprasāraṇaṁ na bhavati |

src_original: vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭāgrahaṇam // Paribh_72 //  spaṣṭā ceyam“yuvoranākau“ityatra bhāṣye/  ghaṭaghaṭīgrahaṇena liṅgaviśiṣṭaparibhāṣayā anityatvāt tanmūlaiṣetyanye//
tgt_original: anyathā yadyanayā paribhāṣayā saṁprasāraṇābhāvo vijñāyate tadā yuvatśabāt kṛdikārāditi ṅiṣi kṛte yuvatītyatra saṁprasāraṇaṁ syādeva |  iyaṁ ca paribhāṣā yuvoranākau ityatra bhāṣye paṭhitā |  matuvasorityatra nyāsakāreṇa vyākhyātā |
